name: Topdown shooter (TheCyberOne)
description:
Controls:

  • move with either w a s d or with your arrow keys
  • aim with your mouse
  • shoot with your main mouse button and hold to shoot more bullets at once 

This is my first ever gam jam submission. Although I didn't quite finish it, it was a fun project to do where I got the chance to learn a lot.

The theme was less is more, so I tried to implement this in a way that less bullets you shoot is more damage. Next time I will defenitly spend more time thinking of mechanics but this time it was a big enough project already.
